column4: Can anyone help me with setting up XMMS, everytime I ./configure I get the error "configure: error: no acceptable cc found in $PATH

2006-02-20T12:06:00.000Z	wastrel	Prophet	 sudo apt-get install build-essential
2006-02-20T12:09:00.000Z	Prophet	wastrel	Thanks Man I owe you, one more thing where do I find GLIB >= 1.2.2?
2006-02-20T12:10:00.000Z	wastrel	Prophet	 dunno that...
2006-02-20T12:54:00.000Z	Prophet	wastrel	Can you help?
2006-02-20T12:55:00.000Z	wastrel	Prophet	 with compiling xmms?  i just used the one in apt
2006-02-20T12:56:00.000Z	Prophet	wastrel	apt?
2006-02-20T12:56:00.000Z	wastrel	Prophet	 apt-get install xmms  ?
2006-02-20T12:57:00.000Z	Prophet	wastrel	when I try that all I get is, E: Could not open lock file /var/lib/apt/lists/lock - open (13 Permission denied)
2006-02-20T12:58:00.000Z	wastrel	Prophet	 sudo apt-get etc etc...
2006-02-20T12:58:00.000Z	Prophet	wastrel	your a savoir
2006-02-20T12:59:00.000Z	wastrel	Prophet	 apt has a lot of software :]   don't compile until you check apt first
2006-02-20T12:59:00.000Z	wastrel	Prophet	 also look at synaptic  - GUI for apt
2006-02-20T13:01:00.000Z	wastrel	Prophet	 hmm...  you may need to enable universe....  look at http://www.ubuntuguide.org/
2006-02-20T13:07:00.000Z	Prophet	wastrel	do you know of any programs (besides xmms) that will listen to internet audio streams?
2006-02-20T14:25:00.000Z	Prophet	wastrel	man do I feel n00bie right now... Forgot that I didn't have any updates/repisitories...... Now xmms works
2006-02-20T14:26:00.000Z	wastrel	Prophet	 cool :] 
2006-02-20T14:28:00.000Z	Prophet	wastrel	after the 30 min of d/l I edited a file to update everything, d/l that than i did the sudo apt-get install crap and it worked, no toying with glib or anything..... It was at this point I grabbed a cup of coffee and swore to only use linux as my OS, with MS it would have been too much effort...
